summary: Completed frontend testing of Financial Aid tab UI/UX enhancements. Fixed critical JSX syntax error (extra closing div tag at line 1273) and missing CSS class (.card-border-left-gray). Verified most visual enhancements are working correctly including bold amounts, aid type icons, colored borders, enhanced hover effects, and mobile responsiveness. NO WhatsApp button present in Aid tab as requested.

ui_bugs.component: MemberDetail.js - Financial Aid Tab - Past Financial Aid section
ui_bugs.issue: Status badges (Completed/Ignored/Active) NOT visible at top-3 right-3 position for past financial aid cards
ui_bugs.details: Code has status badge logic (lines 1120-1129) but only shows badges when event.ignored=true or event.completed=true. Past financial aid events (one-time aid already given) don't have these flags set, so no badge appears. Expected: Past aid should show 'Completed' badge since it's already been distributed.
affected_screens: Member Profile - Aid Tab - Past Financial Aid Given section

items.issue: Missing status badges on Past Financial Aid cards
items.description: Past Financial Aid cards don't show status badges at top-3 right-3 position because the events don't have 'completed' or 'ignored' flags set. Since these are one-time aid payments that have already been given, they should display a 'Completed' badge.
items.suggested_fix: Either: (1) Set event.completed=true when creating one-time financial aid events in the backend, OR (2) Add a default badge for past aid that shows 'Completed' or 'Given' status, OR (3) Add logic to show a badge for all past aid events regardless of completed/ignored status

items.issue: No test data for Upcoming Scheduled Payments
items.description: Cannot fully test Distributed button, Three dots menu, Stop schedule option, frequency icons (ðŸ”„), and Active badges because there are no scheduled payments in the test data. The console shows 'Aid schedules loaded: []'
items.suggested_fix: Create test data with scheduled financial aid (weekly/monthly/annual) to verify: (1) Distributed button (h-11 bg-white), (2) Three dots menu with Stop schedule option, (3) Active badge at top-3 right-3, (4) Frequency icon ðŸ”„, (5) Next: date with ðŸ“… icon
